email.title: DoCSoc Goes Ice Skating - Ticket Release
email.text:
Hi all!
DoCSoc will be going ice skating on the 20th November and **tickets release today** at 13:00! Read on for more info.

event.location: Natural History Museum, Cromwell Road, London, SW7 5BD
event.text:
Get out your scarf and gloves, and join us at the Natural History Museum for our annual ice skating spectacular on Tuesday 20th November at 6:30pm! DoCSoc will be heavily subsidising tickets to just Â£3! We only have a limited number of tickets for this session, so make sure to try and get one. If you do not manage to get a ticket, we will definitely be holding another session, so don't worry!
Tickets will go on sale on Thursday 15th November at 1pm. In order to purchase tickets for the event you first need to secure **Eventbrite placeholder tickets** - https://docsocgoesiceskating.eventbrite.co.uk. Once you have secured a ticket on Eventbrite please head to the **Union website** - https://www.imperialcollegeunion.org/shop/club-society-project-products/computing-products/24917/docsoc-goes-ice-skating to complete the purchase of your ticket **BEFORE 3pm**. Please ensure that you do not buy more than one ticket as any additional tickets will be voided. Please also note that purchases without an Eventbrite placeholder ticket will be cancelled.
The ice skating starts at 7pm, so we will be meeting at 6:30pm at the entrance of the Ice Skating Rink.
We hope to see you there!
